text: Barrington Renford Patterson (25 August 1965 â€“ 22 March 2022) was an English kickboxer and mixed martial artist. He competed in the super heavyweight division and once fought for a world International Kickboxing Federation Kickboxing Championship. In October 1999, Patterson made his debut in mixed martial arts (MMA) at an It's Showtime event. Patterson died of a heart attack in Birmingham, England on 22 March 2022, at the age of 56. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:British mixed martial artists Category:Sportspeople from Staffordshire Category:Kickboxers
title: Barrington Patterson
